duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide physical therapy services to clients of all ages, demonstrating clinical expertise and adherence to healthcare compliance standards.
Utilize current treatment modalities for safe use in the home setting, ensuring patient safety and comfort.
Stay aware of Medicare regulations for coverage of physical therapy in the home, ensuring compliance and proper billing.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation, following all regulatory and legal requirements.
Communicate effectively with clients and their families, providing education and support throughout the rehabilitation process.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to ensure coordinated care for clients and contribute to holistic treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved Physical Therapy school. Current license to practice in Colorado.
Ability to work with clients of all ages.
Professional liability insurance if a contracted service; proof of health/immunization if a contracted service.
